info.name: SubsPlease DarkGreen
info.description: A green-accented dark mode for the SubsPlease website. Some variables such as colors and border radius are tweakable at the top of the stylesheet.
info.additionalInfo:
----
2020 Oct 13 (cont.)
----
- Styled search box on home page
- Modified some colors slightly
----
2020 Oct 13
----
- Moved root variables to their own section
- Completely styled XDCC Packlist to match the site style (uses root variables)
- Fixed a bug with the XDCC Packlist search bar being out of view when scrolling
----
